item.title: Linus Interview Linuxcon North America 2016
item.description:
Linus interviews are always fun to watch. One of favorite past-time activity for me. Loved watching it. Keeping them here.

One good comment mentioned one simple/funny thing in interview

in early MVP version of linux the disk sectors were hard coded
